Title: ASP.NET Wiki Control
Description: This ASP.NET user control allows you to embed a very useful wiki directly into your already existing ASP.NET website taking advantage of the popular Markdown for wiki editing.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This ASP.NET user control allows you to embed a very useful wiki directly into your already existing ASP.NET website taking advantage of the popular Markdown for wiki editing.





A full description and installation guide can be found here: http://www.hamishgraham.net/page/Downloads.aspx/ASP.NET-Wiki-Control-with-Markdown
